meta.description: On Monday, July 25, Ted Kuntz introduced the World Council for Health to the Uniformed Consent documentary.

title: “Uninformed Consent”: A New Documentary with Ted Kuntz
cleaned_text:
On Monday, July 25, Ted Kuntz introduced us to Uniformed Consent, a new documentary.

The film deeply explores the Covid-19 narrative, who is controlling it, and how it’s being used to inject an untested, new technology into almost every person on the planet.

Ted Kuntz is a father, grandfather, medical choice activist, author, and educator. His journey to examine the claims of the vaccine industry began after his son Joshua was neurologically injured by the DPT injection in 1984. He is also the current President of Vaccine Choice Canada.

This presentation is also available on Odysee and Rumble.

This is an edited segment from the weekly live General Assembly meeting on July 25, 2022.

On August 19, the World Council for Health hosted a live screening of this film as well as a Q&A with the film’s creators. The Uniformed Consent documentary is now available to watch in the WCH Video Library.

Here’s what WCH members, staff, and coalition partners are saying about Ted’s presentation:

“I saw the whole video “Uninformed Consent” fantastic well organized, uses real language, is accurate and also emotions effectively. Highly recommended.” – Keren

“That is such a targeted to the point video that will be very awakening for a lot of other people… thank you very much indeed!!!” – Zafeiria Kakaletri

opengraph.title: “Uninformed Consent”: A New Documentary with Ted Kuntz
opengraph.description: The film deeply explores the Covid-19 narrative, who is controlling it, and how it’s being used.
